name: The Search
description: Embark on a journey of discovery and inspiration in The Search - a story-driven puzzle-adventure set in a mysterious world where art comes to life!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3-370M @ 2.40GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
